## Source: ossf-package-analysis (0d58316229ef10836cd767174ee076e5fc92d8e4cf13f52b4b4950853503434a)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'dagger-core' @ 13.8.9 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
